S02n203:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam-ekasmin samaye bhagavān potalake parvate viharati sma |
S02n203:6: anekaiśca śuddhāvāsikairdevaputra koṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta īśvaramaheśvarabrahmakāyikān devaputrān adhikṛtya dharma deśayati sma |
S02n203:7: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃ samuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā praṇamya prahasitavadano bhūtvā bhagavantametadavocat |
S02n203:8: asti mama bhagavan amoghapāśarājannāma hṛdayaṃ yanmayā pūrvvamekanavatime kalpe vilokitāyāṃ lokadhātau lokendrarājo nāma tathāgatasya sakāśādudgṛhītam |
S02n203:9: yena bhagavannīśvara devamaheśvara devaputrapramukhāni vahūni śuddhāvāsikāyika devaputrapramukhānyanekadevaputraśatasahasrāṇi samādāpitānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau asaṃmohajñānavyūhapramukhāni ca mayā daśasamādhiśatasahasrāṇi pratilabdhāni |
S02n203:10: yasmiṃśca puna rbhagavan pṛthivī pradeśe idamamoghapāśahṛdayaṃ pracaret |
S02n203:11: veditavyaṃ bhagavan stasmin pṛthivīpradeśe īśvaramaheśvarabrahmakāyikapramukhāni dvādaśadevaputraśatasahasrāṇi rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye sthāsyanti |
S02n203:14: aneka buddhakoṭi niyutaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyanti |
S02n203:18: avīciparāyaṇaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattva ārya śrāvakapratyeka buddha pratikṣepakaḥ |
S02n203:21: yasyaiva tāvadbhagavan ekopavāho jāpena ihaiva janmani tatkarma viśudhyati |
S02n203:23: ekāhikena jvareṇa dvāhikena trāhikena vā cāturthikena vā evaṃ saptāhi kena vā jvareṇa |
S02n203:24: akṣiśūlena vā karṇa śūlena vā nāsāśūlena vā |
S02n203:26: tāluśūlena va hṛdayaśūlena va udaraśūlena vā pārśvaśūlena vā kaṭiśūlena vā aṅgapratyaṅgaśūlena vā arśagrahaṇīśūlena vā atisāreṇa vā hastapādaveda nayā vā śirorujā va valāhakaścitra kuṣṭhaśriyarccikā kirīmalohaliṅgalagrahabhagaṇḍalavisphoṭaka apasmāra kākhorddakhyai rvākṛtāpakṛtyaivā vaṃndhanaṃ vandhanatāḍana tarjjanā bhūtākhyanairvā |
S02n203:27: saṃkṣepato bhagavan kāyapīḍayāvā cittapīḍayā vā dusvapnadarśanaṃ vā tatkarmaparikṣayaṃ gacchati |
S02n203:29: prāgeva śuddhasattvānāṃ śraddhādhimuktikānāṃ yadi bhagavan catasraḥ pariṣadaścatvāro varṇā yāmā yā sāthenāpiya idamadiyama amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ śroṣyanti |
S02n203:30: udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti anyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śrāvayiṣyanti antastiryagyonigatānāṃ vā sattvānāṃ karṇāpūṭasthitvā karṇajāpaṃ dāṣyanti |
S02n203:35: teṣāṃ daśabhyo digbhyo buddhasahasraṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ kariṣyanti |
S02n203:42: jñātavyamiti bhagavan paṇḍite nāryāvalokiteśvarasyānubhāvena teṣāṃ karṇapuṭe śabdo niścarati |
S02n203:43: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścidevapurūṣaścandanaṃ vā kapūraṃ vā kasturikaṃ vā ākṛṣya paribhāṣya śilāyāṃ vā piṣṭvā ātmānaṃ lepayet |
S02n203:44: na tasya candanasya kapurakasya kasturikāyā vā |
S02n203:45: evaṃ bhavatyanāmākṛṣṭaḥ paribhāṣito vā gandhenāti kramiṣyāmiti |
S02n203:46: api ca gandha eva sa eva meva bhagavanidaṃ madoyamamoghapāśannāma hṛdayaṃ yaḥ kaścidudgrāsdya ullāpya |
S02n203:49: teṣāṃ bhagavana khakānāṃ sattvānāṃ sa eva kuśalamūla heturbhaviṣyati |
S02n203:50: yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra virahitāśca bhaviṣyanti |
S02n203:52: yaḥ kaścit bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā upāśako vā upāśikā vā |
S02n203:55: tasya bhagavan dṛṣṭa eva dharmma viśatiranuśaṃsaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyāḥ |
S02n203:58: utpanāścāsya rogāḥ karmmavaśena śīghraṃ prasamaṃ yāsyanti |
S02n203:68: saptavārāna amoghapāśahṛdayena bhasmodakaṃ vā parijapya digavidigūrddhaṃ ca kṣetrasya vandho dātavya |
S02n203:74: utpannacāsya śatru bhayaṃ śīghraṃ praśamaṃ yāsyati |
S02n203:76: na kākhorddhabhayaṃ na cāsya ḍākinībhayaṃ na cāsya tīvrāḥ kleśopakleśā bhaviṣyanti |
S02n203:79: yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatrāvirahitaśca bhaviṣyati maitrīkarūṇāmuditopekṣāyāḥ |
S02n203:102: dine dine triṣkālaṃ triṇi vārān pariāvarttayitavyaṃ |
S02n203:105: dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ ca valāvalaṃ jñātvā śrāvayitavyam |
S02n203:108: satvānāmārthakaraṇena buddhabodhiḥ prāpyate bodhirityucyate prajñāsattva ityupāyaḥ ||
S02n203:111: idaṃ hṛdayaṃ tathāgatasya purataḥ kīrtta yeyaṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām arthāyabodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocata |
S02n203:113: anumoditaṃ tathāgatena paścime kāle paścime samaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pitṛkāryakariṣyanti |
S02n203:114: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nibhiṣanayano bhūtvā bhagavanta metadabocata |
S02n203:115: śṛṇu me bhagavan sarvabodhisattva namaskṛtamidaṃ vimokṣamukhamaṇḍalaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya ||
S02n203:116: nāmastryadhvānugatapratiṣṭhitebhya sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyo namaḥ pratyekabuddhāryaśrāvaka saṃghebhyo'tītānāgatapratyutpannebhyo namaḥ samyaggatānāṃ |
S02n203:123: namaḥ śikhine tathāgatāya arhate samyak sambuddhāya |
S02n203:130: om same same mahāsame rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvānāṃca sarvapāpaprasamane svāhā || ||  ||
S02n203:137: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya |
S02n203:138: namo atītānāgata pratyutpannebhyo buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ || tadyathā ||
S02n203:139: smṛtivarddhani gativarddhani dhṛtivarddhani prajñāvarddhani pratibhānavarddhani dhyānavarddhani samaryavarddhani sarvabodhipakṣadharmmavarddhani sakalaburddhadharmaparipūṇīye svāhā || ||
S02n203:141: namo ratnatrayāya namo āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākārūṇikāya |
S02n203:142: ebhyo namaskṛtvā idamāryāvalokiteśvaramukhoṅgīrṇamamoghapāśarājannāma hṛdayaṃ tathāgata saṃmukhabhāṣitaṃ mahatā parṣata madhye ahamidāniṃmāvarttayiṣye sidhyantu me mantrapadā sarvvakāryāṇi |

S02n203:202: sarṣaparavadirakīlakādyaiḥ sarvajvareṣu sūtrakaṃ vandhayitavyaṃ sarvavyādhiṣu ghṛtatailamudakaṃ vā parijapya dātavyaṃ |
S02n203:203: kākhordacchedanaṃ rakṣā sūtreṇa śastreṇa udaraśūlena lavaṇodakaṃ viṣa nāśanaṃ mṛttikayā udakena vā cakṣurogena śvetasūtrakaṃ karṇe vandhayitavyaṃ |
S02n203:205: sīmāvandhe paṃcaraṅigakasūtrakamekaviṃśativārān parijapya catuḥṣu khadirakīleṣu vaddhvā caturddiśaṃ nikhātavyaṃ simā vandho bhavati |
S02n203:206: sarvarakṣā sūtrakena udakena bhasmakena vā sarvagraheṣu |
S02n203:207: paṃcaraṅigaka sūtrakaṃ sarvajvareṣu śvetasūtrakaṃ sarppakīṭhalūtalohaliṅgala graheṣu |
S02n203:209: gandhodakaṃ palāśodakaṃ madhūyaṣṭyudaka vā sarvakalikalaha vivādebhyaḥ ākhyāneṣu udakaṃ parijapya mukhaprakṣālayitavyaṃ |
S02n203:210: paraviṣayarājyarāṣṭrakeṣu pūrṇakalaśaṃ sthāpayitvā śūcināsūcivastraprāvṛtena mahatī pūjāṃ kṛtvā bācayitavyaṃ |
S02n203:212: tena codakena sektavyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ rakṣā kṛtā bhavati |
S02n203:214: mudritāyā candanatilakaṃ hṛdaye ekaviṃśativārān parijapya kartavyaṃ sarvānantaryāṇi kṣayaṃ yānti |
S02n203:221: gandhaḥ priyaṃgu tagaracakrā mahācakrāviṣṇukrāntā somarājī sūnandā ceti |
S02n203:223: aṣṭottaraśatavārān parijapya maṇiṃ kṛtvā śirasi bāhau vā dhārayitavyaṃ |
S02n203:224: bālānāṃ galenārīṇāṃ vilagne svayaṃ paraṃ saubhāgyakaraṃ |
S02n203:232: āryāvallokiteśvarahṛdayaṃ paramasiddhamasasādhita mete tāni karmmāṇi kurute |
S02n203:234: paṭe'śleṣaṃ kairvarṇakairbuddhapratimāmālikhya āryyāvalokiśvaro jaṭāmakutadhārī eṇeya carmakṛtaparikaraḥ paśupativeśadhara sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā poṣadhikena citrakareṇa citrāpayitavyaḥ |
S02n203:235: tataḥsādhakena tasyāgrataḥ gomayena maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā śvetapuṣpāvakīrṇa aṣṭāu gandhodakapūrṇakumbhāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ |
S02n203:237: vali mānsaṃ ca rūdhirabarjjitaṃ agarūdhūpaṃ dahatā vidyāaṣṭamasahasraṃ jāpayitavyā |
S02n203:239: triśūklabhojina triṣkālasnāpayitā śūcivastraprāvṛtto bhūtvā japā dātavyaṃ |
S02n203:240: ataḥ pratimāyā'rpataḥ ātmānaṃ ca likhitaṃ paśyati |
S02n203:241: taddaṣṭvā ca prahṛṣyati yāvat svapnane vā āryāvalokiteśvaro āgacchati |
S02n203:243: manaḥ śilāṃ rajataṃ vā parijapya kṣīṇāṃjayitvā tatoantarhito bhavati |
S02n203:247: idamavocat bhagavānāttamanā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva rūteca bhikṣavarūte ca bodhisatvāste śuddhāvāsakāyikāśca devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsura gandharvaścaloko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti || ||
S02n203:250: hyavadatteṣāṃca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
